Rackspace::Solve San Francisco

Tradeshow/Conference
Where
Four Seasons
757 Market St
San Francisco, California 94103
When
July 24-July 26
8:00am-6:00pm
Languages Spoken

Dutch

English

Details

Join us at Rackspace::Solve San Francisco, a free conference where youâll learn how the latest cloud solutions can help you scale your business, get your products to market quickly, and reduce the cost of innovation.

Sessions cover real world solutions to cloud security, big data, and private cloud challenges. Visit our Solutions Pavilion to discuss your companyâs specific needs and whiteboard solutions with Rackspace experts and partners.

Beyond empowering companies to tap into the power of the cloud, Rackspace also strives for social empowerment. In that spirit, weâll make a monetary donation of $15 per attendee to Girls Who Code â up to $5,000. In addition to a great day of learning and networking, your attendance at Rackspace::Solve will help give high school girls the skills and resources they need to pursue opportunities in computing fields.
